attributes.action: give police officers the power to detain people who are inappropriately dressed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As summer time arrives, the good people of Britain will take the streets and the parks to enjoy the sunshine.  If you're a slightly rotund individual, a little podgy or porky, or have ginger hair - the police should be able to enforce a cover up policy, because the rest of us just don't want to see it. Cover up with big clothes that is, not leggings or anything else from Primark.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
